description: Pediatric participants 7 to 12 years (84 to 143 months) old

warnings.message: Please record estimated participant height and weight in the "Height" and "Weight" fields. Do not measure the waist of wheelchair user participants.
Multiple weight measurements indicate very low weight for age. Refer to your site's SOP for an urgent referral.
Multiple height and weight measurements indicate very low BMI. Refer to your site's SOP for an emergent referral.
This value may indicate very low weight for age if confirmed by repeat measure.
The height and weight values may indicate very low BMI if confirmed by repeat measure.

Please verify that the number entered is correct. This value might be outside of the expected range for this age group. If participant weight is outside of the scale measuring range, please record the minimum value on the scale. Then, select "Weight is less than weight measuring range" for Modification to Weight Protocol.

Please verify that the number entered is correct. This value might be outside of the expected range for this age group. If participant weight is outside of the scale measuring range, please record the maximum value on the scale. Then, select 'Weight is more than weight measuring range' for Modification to Weight Protocol.

fields.name: weight-user-entered
fields.label: Enter in pounds (value will be stored in kg)
